name: Rugby Runner
description:
You're the last chance of your team!

Score a try before it is too late.

Controls:

  • Click on visuals buttons
  • Arrows on keyboard can be used to go up and down

Programs used:

  • Godot
  • Clip Studio Paint
  • Git

The Team:

  • Graphics : Pitivie
  • Development: Pitivie, Vylma

Music from Pixabay
